cc.valyriansteelers.news.adapter_and_activity

Class HomeNewsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<HomeNewsAdapter.HomeNewsViewHolder>
      • cc.valyriansteelers.news.adapter_and_activity.HomeNewsAdapter

  • public class HomeNewsAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<HomeNewsAdapter.HomeNewsViewHolder>
    This class is used to create the news recycler view containing the cards of the articles
